title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Morning, bus stop. Stan and Kyle wait for the bus, and Kyle arrives

text: You goys!!! Hey you guys!!! Oh my God!! Oh my God, you guys!!

text: I was just-  I was just watching the TV! They had this commercial.

text: never been said on television.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Day, South Park Center for Seismic Activity, water cooler. Randy Marsh and three others shoot the breeze there

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Night, the town bar. Many of the town's men, including Randy and his coworkers, are inside watching "Cop Drama." The officers in the show speak in hushed tones

text: Do you really think anything's gonna be any different now?!  Do you really think that this will have the tiniest, smallest effect on the world?  It's still the same old world out there. Look.  What the hell?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Channel 4 News

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Last night, the daring and bold show, Cop Drama , broke new ground by saying "SHIT" on television, making "shit" officially okay to say around the country. A recent poll shows that 24% of Americans think the show has pushed the envelope too far, while a whopping 76% say they don't really give a shit.  In other news, a strange virus which causes victims to vomit up their intestines is making life shitty for a small farming community. Rick Watts has the story.

text: Thanks, Tom. Shit is certainly going down here in the small tow-

text: Alright, children, in lieu of the common usage, I'm s'posed to clarify the school's position on the word, "shit."

text: Yes, but only in the figurative noun form or the adjective form

text: Huh?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You can only use it in the non-literal sense. For instance,  "That's a shitty picture of me." is now fine. Hoever, the literal noun form of  "This is a picture of shit." is still naughty.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The adjective form is now also acceptable. For example:  "The weather outside is shitty." However, the literal adjective is NOT appropriate. For example:  "My bad diarrhea made the inside of the toilet bowl shitty, and I had to clean it with a rag, which then also became shitty."  That's right out!

text: Halt your evil plans!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Huh?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I possess the Rune Stone of Undoing! Who is in charge here?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Oh...  nno, you guys didn't hire me a stripper for my birthday-oooh, tell me you guys didn't.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Show your true form, Geldon, lest you be afraid! Your short time in this world is at an end!  Awch. The Rune Stone has no effect! You are not Geldon!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I never said I was.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You will die anyway, for you have spread the word of curse!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Security!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Waaarrgh!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: HBC headquarters, Hollywood, day, outside. Chef and the boys approach the fallen knight.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Who are you?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Take this.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: What are we supposed to do with it?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Eeehhhhhhhhhhhhhhh.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Now what?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We've got to find people who would know what the hell this is all about. Children, we're goin'ta have to go to the land of castles, knights, and kings!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Las Vegas, sunset, a view of the Strip, showing many of the attractions that can be found there.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Lords and Ladies, we bid you welcome to the grandest casino in the land, Excalibur!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Take a free spin. Double your odds.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: 'Scuse me. Do you work here?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: How can I help you, noble sir?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We need some help identifying an ancient English stone.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: A what?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: It might hold the key to a curse.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Uh... I can help get you some credit or a comp meal, perhaps.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Dude, we need help from the British!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Lluhook kid, Thihis is just a casino. I can't help you. You know, not every British person knows about wizards and dragons and curses.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We just need help identifying this.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The Rune Stome of Gaelic! Where did you get this?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You know what it is?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The Skyre once spoke of such a stone! Come, we must see the sorcerer!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The men are gathered there once again

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Get ready for "Must Shit TV!" Starting now, four straight hours of pure shit! It's all live!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. Drew and Mimi are onstage, with Drew sitting at his desk

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Hey! Hm, heh, shit! Heh.  Ya ain't shit.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Hyeh. Dude, ya ain't shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: This is it. My greatest work.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Excalibur, inside. The barker leads Chef and the boys down a hall and run into a waitress dressed as a damsel

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Cocktails. Cocktails.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: There Americans wish to see the Skyre!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Let us make haste to the inner sanctum!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Excalibur, the hallway to the Inner Sanctum. The barker and waitress lead Chef and the boys through

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: How could you foolish Americans bring the wrath of scorn by mass-chanting the word of wretchedness?!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Aah, yeah. We didn't mean to.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Didn't you realize "shit" is a curse word?!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Well, yeah, but I don't think that "curse word" meant... curse word.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Ha! Leave it to American to think that "no" means yes, "pissed" means angry, and "curse word" means something other than a word that's cursed!!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The Inner Sanctum. The group enters and walks towards the sorcerer

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Let me see the stone.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: But I don't get it. People use curse words all the time.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Saying a word of curse once in a while does nothing. It's only when spoken repeatedly and en masse that the curse takes place.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Uhuh-I've seen this before. Stones that were used by the Knights of Standards and Practices.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Knights of Standards and Practices?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: A legion of men sworn to do whatever necessary to keep the words at bay. But... they were just a myth.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The men watch the Drew Carey Show

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You know what? You're dumb as shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Oh yeah?! Well, I don't really give a shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Ng-aah, that word's kind of getting old. It's not really... funny anymore.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Yeah, they're gonna have to come up with a new swear word now.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Well, they can't use "fag." Because you can't say "fag" unless you're a homosexual.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Really? So we can't say __g?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: No. See, you got beeped.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You mean you have to be a __g to say __g?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: That's right.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Hell, that's not fair! I should be able to say "fag."

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: ...Hey, you didn't get beeped.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Uh oh.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Well well well! Guess we learned something new about you, Jimbo, you freakin' fag! You wanna make out or something?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Aw, man, I am up shit creek.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. The door to stage C opens and in gallop the knights with swords drawn

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Serves you right, shit-for-brains!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Yeah, how could I be such a dumb...sh-

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Say not the word of curse!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: What the?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Holy shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The men watch the Drew Carey Show

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Oh boy, this show is really reaching for plot now!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Excalibur, the Inner Sanctum. The Sorcerer continues with the mythology of the knights

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The knights were formed to keep curse words to a minimum. Should a curse word ever be let out, they would return. A rune for each word of curse was made, representing each of the eight words that so offended God...

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Look, there's the F-word.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: And asshole.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I knew it! Meecrob!  Meecrob is a curse word! God must hate it as much as I do!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Look at this: The writing here claims this stone can defeat the evil geldon , who will rise when the word of curse has been said enough times to give him power. Then all the world will be destroyed.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: All the world destroyed?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: My house, too?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Oh no!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: What?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Tonight is the "Night of a Million Shits" on HBC! It's gonna be said over and over!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Then we haven't much time. We must go!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. The blond knight approaches the cameraman

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Turn off those devices of broadcast!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: What is coing on here?! Stop this shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We are the Royal Order of Standards and Practices!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We command you to stop saying the curse word!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Listen, Mr. Shinypants, I am the head of this network, and I will say "shit" all I want! Shit, shit, shit shit shit, shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit, , shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit shit!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The TV screen is show, with the HBC logo

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: And now, back to Must Shit TV, here on HBC.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. The terror continues - the knights fight the geldon valiantly

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: He is too strong! We cannot fight him without the rune stone!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: My, my GOD, sir! What have you unleashed upon the world?!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I didn't know.  I DIDN'T KNOW!!!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The men watch in increasing disbelief

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I, I can't follow this shitty storyline at all.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. The terror continues, but Chef and the boys arrive

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Wait!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Oh boy, that thing has really got sand in its vagina!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The rune stone! Point it towards Geldon!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Agh. Dude, lame. Lame!  Sorry, dudes.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: What a stupid voice.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: It's okay. The curse has been lifted.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Yeah. We all gotta make sure it doesn't come back.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: You see, we've learned something today. Swearing can be fun, but doing it all the time causes a lot of problems.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Cut to Kyle's home, where he's on TV

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We're all saying the S-word too much!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Kyle.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Look, Gerald. Kyle's on television!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Uh huh.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Cut to the old folks' home

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: The knights of Standards and Practices were created to make sure that bad words were kept to a minimum. "Curse words" They're called that because they are a curse. We have to go back to only using curse words in rare, extreme circumstances.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: And besides, too much use of a dirty word takes away from its... impact. We believe in free speech and all that, but... keeping a few words taboo just adds to the fun of English.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: So please, everyone, From now on you've got to try and watch your language.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: South Park, bar, night. The men think over the boys' message

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Yeah.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: That makes sense.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Ain't that right?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Is this still part of the show?

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: On the set of the Drew Carey show. The place is calm now

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: We're sorry, noble knights of Standards and Pracrices,  from now on, we will obey your laws.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: See that you do!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: I'm very proud of you, children. Let's all go home and find a nice white woman to make love to.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Yeah! And Kenny didn't die!

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: (Yeah, I didn't- Goddamnit! Aargh!)

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Holy shi-  poo.

title: IT HITS THE FAN
text: Hah, I love you guys.
